description: Declarative description of monorepo workspaces for the Kayak-like travel platform. This file is primarily documentation to complement npm workspaces declared in the root package.json.
_notes: The authoritative workspace configuration for npm is defined in the root package.json under the `workspaces` field.
This file exists to make the workspace layout explicit and easy to inspect for tools or contributors that do not parse package.json.
Each listed package directory will eventually have its own package.json (for JS/Node) or equivalent configuration (for Python-based services like ai-service).
